TopicTitle: Question: What ship mods do you use with Mechjeb

Articles.Content:
Hey all,

I am just experimenting with mods and trying to get the game to a point I am comfortable with in Career mode, having some starter ships essentially is my goal.

Question:

Seeking SSTO, Interplanetary type stuff that can be flown with Mechjeb. Does any one out here have some recommendations?

I am using this as a LKO delivery method atm, and it can get out farther depending on load: http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/122576-SELV-Stockalike-Expendable-Launch-Vehicles-V-1-1-KSP-1-0x-Updated-26-05-2015

I have been browsing. The forums are just so deep I figured I would ask.

Thank you!
Modding question moved to the modding subforum.
